sections.title: Online Customer Service
sections.content:
If you’d like to place an order over the phone or have questions regarding your adidas.com order 8AM ET – 11PM ET, 7 days a week
800-982-9337

sections.title: Corporate Consumer Relations
sections.content:
If you need to contact our corporate office or would like to set up a product quality claim Monday thru Friday from 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST
800-448-1796

sections.title: Adiconcierge Bulk Sales
sections.content:
If you’re interested in tracking down hard to find products, want to place a Bulk order or buy gift cards for corporate use Monday thru Friday from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM PST
888-923-4327
